timeline.bodyText:
can it be a relative path?
if not, then maybe add a placeholder for git and a comment to say you should change it to the path on your system?

timeline.message:
Convert Kafka Keystore Truststore to PKCS12

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

Fix for p12 issue and subsequent issues

Fixed an error condition when the array is empty (it never checks for
COS)
Changed cosEndpintUrl to cosEndpointUrl
Updated the ImportOperationTest
Fixed issue with JOB_PARAMETERS_ID
Renamed Configuration Name

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: the mix of all-lower and camelCase looks odd to me
timeline.author: lmsurpre
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -97,7 +97,7 @@
      * Parse the command line arguments
      *   --cosapikey:       the IBM COS API key or S3 access key.
      *   --cossrvinstid:    the IBM COS service instance id or S3 secret key.
-     *   --cosendpinturl:   the IBM COS or S3 End point URL.
+     *   --cosEndpointUrl:   the IBM COS or S3 End point URL.
      *   --coslocation:     the IBM COS or S3 location.
      *   --cosbucketname:   the IBM COS or S3 bucket name to import from.
      *   --coscredentialibm: if use IBM credential(Y/N), default(Y).
